titles.title: Informing Grandfamilies Act
Informing Grandfamilies Act
A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to provide information about available benefits and services to kinship caregivers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Informing Grandfamilies Act
This bill requires states to notify kinship caregivers (e.g., grandparents or other relatives caring for a minor child) about (1) the care and placement options under federal, state, and local laws; (2) the requirements to become a foster family home; (3) whether the state has elected to make guardianship assistance payments; and (4) other policies under the state program that may assist such caregivers.
